changelog: Update text colors for better contrast
Update all background colors to use the new dark theme
Update button colors with hover states
Improve the layout with proper spacing between icon and text
Change the text to be more descriptive (`MARKETPLACE` and `MY VEHICLES`)
Adjust the card sizes and spacing to fit better in the new layout
The status badges now look more consistent with the plate and class badges while still maintaining their distinct colors and icons.
Maintain the status badges with icons only in the `MY VEHICLES` tab
Remove the status badges from the marketplace tab since all cars there are listed for sale anyway
